name: INDERMA LABORATOIRE DERMATOLOGIQUE
goal: Inderma is a French R&D laboratory for placing cosmetic products on the French Market and in Asia. The laboratory is specialized in the dermo-cosmetic and the natural-based cosmetic products. We work closely with the french, european and swiss manufacturers. We place our cosmetic products in pharmacies and we export our products to China, Taïwan, Korea, Switzerland, Canada...
interests: Consumers, Customs, Environment, Food Safety, Fraud prevention, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Allergens notification on the finished goods, D4 and D5 restrictions in the cosmetic products, plastic microparticles in the cosmetic products.
